duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist technicians, chemists, and staff in various responsibilities in the analytical laboratories.
Promote safety and a safe working environment in the Lab.
Assist with routine sampling activities for Analytical & Quality Control Staff.
Perform routine analytical testing of plant production and environmental samples.
Review and provide timely reporting of analytical data.
Assist with maintaining instrumentation as required by instrument manufacturers and procedures.
Prepare standards, reagents, and working solutions as specified in analytical methods.
